title: Scalpel vs. Silicon: Why Surgery Will Never Be Fully Automated
description: For decades, progress in medicine has followed a predictable pattern: technology advances, outcomes improve, and human labor evolves. Today, however, that trajectory is being questioned more radically than ever. In a series of public statements, Elon Musk has suggested that artificial intelligence and robotics may soon outperform human surgeons altogether. His logic is straightforward—machines do […]

title: Donald Trump’s COP Out
description: The U.S. has invested far too much political and financial capital into a process ill-suited to address the ostensible climate problem, a process that often works against American interests and values. Indeed, at a time when the U.S. is in an artificial intelligence race with China—competition shaped by access to affordable and reliable energy—the UNFCCC…
content:
By Stephen Eule
President Trump’s decision to withdraw the U.S. from the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) was long overdue.

title: Sridhar Vembu wants engineers to stop vibe coding, suggests alternative amid AI job loss scare
description: Sridhar Vembu does not want you to ‘vibe code.’ Rather, the Zoho cofounder has suggested a new term – “AI-assisted Code Engineering" or ACE for short. Vembu believes that this will ensure that software engineers gain more productivity without the risk of losing jobs to artificial intelligence.
content: Zoho cofounder Sridhar Vembu is not a fan of vibe coding – the use of AI to write code. At a time when AI tools like Cursor can write thousands, if not millions, of lines of code, the Zoho boss wants you to take a different approach – a way where AI ... [2010 chars]
